news.title: ‘We ask you keep Gena in your hearts’ – Family of Mayo charity worker kidnapped in Haiti say situation is ‘deeply worrying’
news.summary: The family of an Irish woman among eight people who were kidnapped from an orphanage near the Haitian capital of Port-au-Prince yesterday has said they are “absolutely devastated” by the news.

news.title: How Haitian town where Irish missionary was abducted has slipped into lawlessness as brutal gang expands its power
news.summary: The Haitian town from where Irish missionary Gena Heraty was abducted has been under siege since the start of the year by a criminal group designated as a foreign terror organisation by the US government.

news.title: Chief suspect in Conor McGregor pub arson attack also suspected of Dublin assault
news.summary: Gardai have identified a chief suspect for an arson attack on Conor McGregor’s Dublin pub — who is also suspected of carrying out an unprovoked assault in the capital.

news.title: Storm Floris: Almost 3,000 homes and farms without power as Ireland misses worst of the storm
news.summary: Over 10,000 homes and businesses lost power as Storm Floris swept past Ireland's north west coast with winds gusting to almost 100kmh on Monday morning.

news.title: New Lord of Slane Castle Alex Conyngham planning ‘massive’ gig at iconic Meath venue in summer 2026

news.title: Lions jury: Conclusions drawn from Australia 2025, how Tour will be remembered, and will it affect Ireland?
